column4: what i want to do is download some videos off youtube and convert them into .amr files so they can be played on my wife's phone. what software, if any, does this?
you do need to string a few programs together... first of all, you want a YouTube download bookmarklet that will save a file as an MPEG... one sec...

okay, here's a good video download bookmarklet: http://1024k.de/bookmarklets/video-bookmarklets.html It doesn't actually save it as an MPEG, but you can convert flv videos to other formats using mencoder. My gosh, this channel is moving too fast. I'll get you the rest in a sec.
what sort of file did you say you wanted to convert it to?
